title: Two Punctures and Racing on the Wrong Bike: Jonas Vingegaard Survives Tour de France Gravel Nightmare
content:
Defending champion finishes on flat tire and slams gravel sectors in Tour as ‘unnecessary risk’ after racing most of stage on bike of teammate Jan Tratnik.

Read the full article at Two Punctures and Racing on the Wrong Bike: Jonas Vingegaard Survives Tour de France Gravel Nightmare on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
